net.proteusframework.core.geo

Class CountryInformation

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.proteusframework.core.geo.CountryInformation

  • public abstract class CountryInformation
extends Object
    Provides country information.

    All ISO references refer to ISO 3166 for countries and ISO 639 for languages.

    To provide a custom / configured instance of this class to callers of getInstance(), set a System property or configure a spring bean.

    ISO 3166 supports 3 different codes: 2-letter (digram), 3-letter (trigram), and numeric. Implementations must support at a minimum 2-letter codes.

    Example:

    System Property: -Dnet.proteusframework.core.geo.CountryInformation=com.xyz.MyCountryInformationImplementation

    SpringBean: <bean id="CountryInformation" class="com.xyz.MyCountryInformationImplementation"/>

    Author:
    Russ Tennant (russ@i2rd.com)

    • Method Detail

      • findISO2CountryCodeByPostalCode

        public abstract String findISO2CountryCodeByPostalCode(String postalCode,
                                     String defaultISOCountryCode)
        Get the first matching ISO country code for the specified postal code.
        Parameters:
        postalCode - the postal code.
        defaultISOCountryCode - a default country code to return if a match isn't found. May be null.
        Returns:
        the first matching ISO country code (digram) that matches the specified postal code.

      • getCanonicalTimeZonesByCodeOrCountry

        public SortedSet<String> getCanonicalTimeZonesByCodeOrCountry(String codeOrCountry)
        Get the canonical TimeZone IDs by country code or country name.
        Parameters:
        codeOrCountry - the code or country name.
        Returns:
        the TimeZone IDs.

      • getCountryCallingCodeByCountry

        public String getCountryCallingCodeByCountry(String countryOrISOCode)
        Convenience method for getting a country by either the ISO country code or the country name.
        Parameters:
        countryOrISOCode - the country name or ISO code.
        Returns:
        the calling code without the "+" prefix or null if one wasn't found.
        See Also:
        getCountryCallingCodeByISOCountryCode(String), getISO2CountryCode(String, String)

      • getCountryCallingCodeByISOCountryCode

        public abstract String getCountryCallingCodeByISOCountryCode(String isoCountryCode)
        Get the country calling code for a country by the ISO code.

        This will always return null if supportsCountryCallingCode() returns false

        Parameters:
        isoCountryCode - the ISO country code. If null returns null.
        Returns:
        the calling code without the "+" prefix or null if one wasn't found.

      • getCountryNameByISOCountryCode

        public abstract String getCountryNameByISOCountryCode(String isoLanguage,
                                    String isoCountry)
        Return the country name if found in the specified language. If the country name isn't localized in that language, then an implementation default localization is returned. If the country name is not found, the code is returned.
        Parameters:
        isoCountry - the country code. If null, null is returned.
        isoLanguage - the language.
        Returns:
        the country name or code.

      • getCountryTimeZonesByCodeOrCountry

        public SortedSet<String> getCountryTimeZonesByCodeOrCountry(String codeOrCountry)
        Get the country TimeZone IDs by country code or country name.
        Parameters:
        codeOrCountry - the code or country name.
        Returns:
        the TimeZone IDs. If this returns an empty set, you may want to use the results of getCanonicalTimeZonesByCodeOrCountry(String).

        Get the default implementation.

      • getInverseISO2CountryMap

        public SortedMap<String,String> getInverseISO2CountryMap(String isoLanguage)
        Get a map of country names to ISO country codes (digram).
        Parameters:
        isoLanguage - the language.
        Returns:
        a mutable map of country name to country code.

      • getISO2CountryCode

        public abstract String getISO2CountryCode(@Nullable
                        String isoLanguage,
                        String country)
        Return the ISO Country Code digram for the specified country. This method will resolve the specified country into an ISO country code. Example:

        getISOCountryCode(null, "US") => US
        getISOCountryCode(null, "USA") => US
        getISOCountryCode(null, "United States") => US
        getISOCountryCode("en", "Estados Unidos") => null
        getISOCountryCode("es", "Estados Unidos") => US
        getISOCountryCode(null, "Estados Unidos") => US

        Parameters:
        isoLanguage - optional language. If not specified, performance may suffer.
        country - the country.
        Returns:
        the ISO country code or null if not found.

      • getISO2CountryCodeList

        public abstract List<String> getISO2CountryCodeList()
        Get a list of ISO country codes (digram).
        Returns:
        a mutable list.

      • getISO2CountryCodeOrCountry

        public String getISO2CountryCodeOrCountry(String isoLanguage,
                                 String country)
        Convenience method that call getISO2CountryCode(String, String) and returns the specified country if that method returns null.
        Parameters:
        isoLanguage - optional language. If not specified, performance may suffer.
        country - the country.
        Returns:
        the ISO country code digram or the specified country if not found.

      • getISO2CountryCodeSet

        public abstract Set<String> getISO2CountryCodeSet()
        Get a set of ISO country codes (digram).
        Returns:
        a mutable set.

      • getISO2CountryMap

        public Map<String,String> getISO2CountryMap(String isoLanguage)
        Get a map of ISO country codes (digram) to country names.
        Parameters:
        isoLanguage - the language.
        Returns:
        a mutable map of country code to country name.

      • getTimeZonesByCodeOrCountry

        public SortedSet<String> getTimeZonesByCodeOrCountry(String codeOrCountry)
        Get the TimeZone IDs by country code or country name.

        This method eliminates equivalent timezones preferring country specific timezones like 'US/Central' as opposed to 'America/Chicago' if possible.

        Parameters:
        codeOrCountry - the code or country name.
        Returns:
        the TimeZone IDs.

      • hasNANP

        public abstract boolean hasNANP(String isoCountryCode)
        Test if the specified ISO country code uses the North American Numbering Plan.

        This will always return false if supportsCountryCallingCode() returns false

        Parameters:
        isoCountryCode - the country code. If null, false is returned.
        Returns:
        true or false.

        Parameters:
        args - args not used.

        public abstract boolean supportsCountryCallingCode()
        Test if this implementation supports returning country dialing codes.
        Returns:
        true or false.
